name: Validation of response

children.description: Given the user is calling the Assignment Trigger API
When the user performs a get request to the Assessment Trigger API
And the user is triggering Assessment "USER_SCORE_CALCULATION"
Then the request returns success triggered by Assessment "USER_SCORE_CALCULATION"
And the body is validated based on the Assessment "USER_SCORE_CALCULATION"
